} System.out.println();} method 3ï¼š 1System.out.println(Arrays.deepToString(array)); æ•°ç»„ç»ƒä¹ æ•°ç»„æ‹·è´ 1public static int[] copyOf(int[] original,int newLength) original - è¦å¤åˆ¶çš„æ•°ç»„ newLength - è¦è¿”å›çš„å‰¯æœ¬çš„é•¿åº¦ 1public static int[] copyOfRange(int[] original,int from,int to) original - è¦ä»ä¸­å¤åˆ¶èŒƒå›´çš„æ•°ç»„from - è¦å¤åˆ¶çš„èŒƒå›´çš„åˆå§‹ç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼‰to - è¦å¤åˆ¶çš„èŒƒå›´çš„æœ€ç»ˆç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆä¸åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼‰ 12345678int[] arr={1,2,3,4,5};int[] arr2=Arrays.copyOf(arr,arr.length);System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr2)); //{1ï¼Œ2ï¼Œ3ï¼Œ4ï¼Œ5}arr[0]=100;System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr2)); //{1ï¼Œ2ï¼Œ3ï¼Œ4ï¼Œ5}System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr)); //{100ï¼Œ2ï¼Œ3ï¼Œ4ï¼Œ5}int[] arr3=Arrays.copyOfRange(arr,1,3); // æ‹·è´[1,3)èŒƒå›´å†…çš„æ•°ç»„System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr3)); //{2ï¼Œ3} æ•°ç»„æ’åºï¼ˆå†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼‰1234567891011121314151617181920public static void main(String[] args) { int[] arr={11,2,31,14,5}; bubbleSort(arr); System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));}public static void bubbleSort(int[] arr){ for (int i = 0; i < arr.length-1; i++) { boolean flg=false; for (int j = 0; j < arr.length-1-i; j++) { if(arr[j]>arr[j+1]){ int tmp=arr[j]; arr[j]=arr[j+1]; arr[j+1]=tmp; flg=true; } } if(flg==false) break; }} æ•°ç»„æ’åºï¼ˆå¶æ•°åœ¨å‰ï¼Œå¥‡æ•°åœ¨åï¼‰123456789101112131415161718192021222324public static void main(String[] args) { int[] arr={1,2,3,4,5}; transform(arr); System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));}public static void transform(int[] arr){ int left=0; int right=arr.length-1; while(left<right){ while(left<right&&arr[left]%2==0){ left++; } //é‡åˆ°å¥‡æ•°äº† while(left<right&&arr[right]%2!=0){ right--; } //é‡åˆ°å¶æ•°äº† if(left<right){ int tmp=arr[left]; arr[left]=arr[right]; arr[right]=tmp; } }}
